title: PIERCE THE VEIL & SLEEPING WITH SIRENS Announce North American Tour
description: So is everyone gonna announce tours today?
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 2 hours ago
excerpt: So is everyone gonna announce tours today?
text: Every tour for 2025 is getting announced today, apparently. This time it's Pierce The Veil and Sleeping With Sirens with their I Can't Hear You Tour that kicks off on May 13 at PNC Music Pavilion in Charlotte, NC. Portions of the tour feature Daisy Grenade and Beach Weather as openers, and you can get your tickets right here. 5/13 PNC Music Pavilion Charlotte, NC (+ Daisy Grenade)5/15 MIDFLORIDA Credit Union Amphitheatre Tampa, FL (+ Daisy Grenade)5/16 Lakewood Amphitheatre Atlanta GA (+ Daisy Grenade)5/17 Welcome to Rockville Daytona Beach, FL (+ Daisy Grenade)5/19 Highmark Skyline Stage at The Mann Philadelphia, PA (+ Daisy Grenade)5/20 Madison Square Garden New York, NY (+ Daisy Grenade)5/24 Jiffy Lube Live Bristow, VA (+ Daisy Grenade)5/25 The Pavilion at Star Lake Burgettstown, PA5/27 Place Bell Laval, QC5/28 Budweiser Stage Toronto, ON5/30 Xfinity Center Mansfield, MA6/1 Michigan Lottery Amphitheatre Sterling Heights, MI6/3 Blossom Music Center Cuyahoga Falls, OH6/4 Nashville Municipal Auditorium Nashville, TN6/6 The Armory Minneapolis, MN6/7 Credit Union 1 Amphitheatre Tinley Park, IL6/8 Hollywood Casino Amphitheatre St. Louis, MO (+ Beach Weather)6/11 Moody Center Austin, TX (+ Beach Weather)6/12 The Cynthia Woods Mitchell Pavilion Houston, TX (+ Beach Weather)6/13 Dos Equis Pavilion Dallas, TX (+ Beach Weather)6/15 Talking Stick Resort Amphitheatre Phoenix, AZ (+ Beach Weather)6/17 Isleta Amphitheater Albuquerque, NM (+ Beach Weather)6/19 Red Rocks Amphitheatre Morrison, CO (+ Beach Weather)6/20 Utah First Credit Union Amphitheatre Salt Lake City, UT (+ Beach Weather)6/22 WAMU Theater Seattle, WA (+ Beach Weather)6/23 RV Inn Style Resorts Amphitheater Ridgefield, WA (+ Beach Weather)6/25 Toyota Pavilion at Concord Concord, CA (+ Beach Weather)6/27 The Kia Forum Los Angeles, CA (+ Beach Weather)6/29 PH Live at Planet Hollywood Resort & Casino Las Vegas, NV (+ Beach Weather) Want More Metal? html:
Every tour for 2025 is getting announced today, apparently. This time it's Pierce The Veil and Sleeping With Sirens with their I Can't Hear You Tour that kicks off on May 13 at PNC Music Pavilion in Charlotte, NC. Portions of the tour feature Daisy Grenade and Beach Weather as openers, and you can get your tickets right here.

5/13 PNC Music Pavilion Charlotte, NC (+ Daisy Grenade)
5/15 MIDFLORIDA Credit Union Amphitheatre Tampa, FL (+ Daisy Grenade)
5/16 Lakewood Amphitheatre Atlanta GA (+ Daisy Grenade)
5/17 Welcome to Rockville Daytona Beach, FL (+ Daisy Grenade)
